summary: An email chain between FBI agents and federal prosecutors regarding a threat assessment requested by an attorney for a victim (an Epstein guard). The chain discusses a threatening email sent to the attorney's firm, which is forwarded for investigation and potential subpoena to Google.

persons.name: Jason Foy
persons.context: Attorney from Foy & Seplowitz LLC who forwards a threatening email received by his partner to the US Attorney's Office, requesting a threat assessment for his client.

persons.name: James Seplowitz
persons.context: Partner of Jason Foy who initially received the threatening email at their law firm.

persons.name: Eric Sarraga
persons.context: Copied on the internal email between attorneys Jason Foy and James Seplowitz regarding the threatening message.

connections.description: Law partners at Foy & Seplowitz LLC; Seplowitz received the threat and forwarded it to Foy.
Foy is requesting a threat assessment from the government on behalf of his client, identified as one of the Epstein guards.

events.title: Threatening Email Sent
events.description: An email with the subject line referencing the victim and containing the text 'THIS ISN'T OVER!!' is sent from 'Vegas Army Vet' to attorney James Seplowitz.

events.title: Attorney Requests Threat Assessment
events.description: Attorney Jason Foy forwards the threatening email to the US Attorney's Office, formally requesting the government investigate the threat against his client's safety.

events.title: FBI/Prosecutor Coordination on Threat
events.description: FBI agents and Assistant US Attorneys coordinate via email to assess the threat, discuss generating a subpoena to Google for subscriber information, and consider a Non-Disclosure Order (NDO).

keyFacts: The threatened individual is identified as a victim who is 'one of the Epstein guards.'
The threat was sent via email from an account believed to be linked to Las Vegas, with the sender using the alias 'Vegas Army Vet.'
Law enforcement was actively considering issuing a subpoena to Google for subscriber information related to the threatening email account.
The email chain reveals coordination between the victim's attorneys (Foy & Seplowitz) and federal prosecutors/FBI regarding post-conviction security concerns.
Multiple names of law enforcement and prosecution personnel are redacted in the document.
